GapFillDragDrop.Title: Globalisation
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Drag each word or phrase to the correct place.

Content.Question:
1. One reason for increased air travel is mass tourism and cheaper flights.
2. The UK figures for emigration have increased dramatically with many people leaving the country to improve their way of living in other countries.
3. A lot of people will buy certain products because they recognise a well-known brand.
4. It’s amazing how some people such as famous footballers are recognised worldwide.
5. I think there was a clash of ideas at the meeting because everyone had such different priorities.
6. The benefits of a multi-ethnic society are vast. We can learn so much about other people’s ways of life.
7. Small local businesses are often forced out by powerful, large corporations.
8. Worldwide communication networks allow us to communicate with friends and colleagues in
different countries from the comfort of our homes and offices.
9. Their business concept was so original that international investors were interested in their company.
10. Many people seek holiday destinations away from the masses to find out more about traditional ways
of living in different countries.
